content: What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other? — George Eliot
author: Zen Quotes

content: A Hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles. — Christopher Reeve
author: Zen Quotes

content: As a matter of fact is an expression that precedes many an expression that isn't. — Laurence J. Peter
author: Zen Quotes

content: Today is plenty; right now is enough. Tomorrow will come in good time. Until it does, live the depth of now. — Ralph Marston
author: Zen Quotes
